meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of xylography.
meanings.sent1: The xylographic design on the wooden frame was intricate.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a xylographic technique to create the detailed print.
meanings.sent3: The xylographic patterns on the door made it look like a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: Her xylographic skills were as sharp as the tools she used.
meanings.sent5: The xylographic patterns seemed to come alive with every stroke.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to wood engraving or woodcuts.
meanings.sent1: The xylographic illustrations in the book were beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She admired the xylographic prints displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The xylographic images on the tree trunk were a surprise to the hikers.
meanings.sent4: His xylographic artistry transformed plain wood into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The xylographic carvings told a story of ancient craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: A print made from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: The xylographic displayed in the museum was centuries old.
meanings.sent2: He purchased a xylographic of a famous painting for his collection.
meanings.sent3: The xylographic hanging on the wall added a rustic touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: She studied the xylographic closely to appreciate the fine details.
meanings.sent5: The xylographic captured the essence of nature in a unique way.
